text: Unity is an unincorporated community in Scotland County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Unity was established in 1857, and remained in operation until 1907. The community most likely was named after nearby Unity Cumberland Presbyterian Church. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Scotland County, Missouri Category:1857 establishments in Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Unity, Missouri
